summary: A young writer whose proposal was recently rejected goes to Greenland to spend a year at an outpost for hunting and trapping animals for furs. At the outpost he meets two men who are none too keen to spend the winter with the newcomer.
cast: Stellan Skarsgård|Gard B. Eidsvold|Bjørn Sundquist|Camilla Martens|Paul-Ottar Haga|Johannes Joner|Erik Øksnes|Lars Andreas Larssen|Juni Dahr|Johan Rabaeus|Frank Iversen|Tinkas Qorfiq
title: Zero Kelvin
